job_title: Software Engineer in Test - MTS or SMTS
job_description:
• Analysis and Design: Participate in a Test Design Review Board for integration test plans within and across clouds with focus on functional, business, complex scenarios, high impact projects, usability, and accessibilityMaster clouds requirements (e.
• Underlying techstack, business usage, implementation)Create end-to-end, cross cloud-impacting, integration automation (API and UI) with complex Salesforce orgsInterface with customers to understand real life usage, build test casesExecute Testing with complex org setup, varied data modelsOrganize and drive cross product testingMonitor product and/or feature-level quality health metrics (testability, test health, test coverage, etc)Works closely with senior developers, PM, and UX to ensure their features are delivered to meet business and quality requirementsYou are providing leadership and coaching to others on your scrum teams, as well as providing mentoring to others who may be on other scrum teams.

• Experience in design and implementation of Web Services and Prompt Engineering.
• Testing experience in Selenium/Gherkins.
• Proven experience with the development and maintenance of regression and performance tests in a complex architecture.
• 3+ years of automated testing experience in a web-based environment.
• Excellent problem solving and communication skills.

job_city: New York - New York City Metro -
job_description:
• Build deep expertise across Salesforce solutions and roadmap through close collaboration with product teams, and advocate for customer needs via Voice of the Customer feedback.
• 5+ years of relevant experience in the IT industry, with background in pre-sales, implementation, or post-sales roles on the Salesforce platform.
• Experience with one or more Salesforce product clouds, including Sales Cloud, Service Cloud, Platform, and/or Experience Cloud.
• Hands-on Salesforce platform experience.
• Strong problem-solving skills with the ability to collaborate across teams and industries.
• Excellent verbal, written, presentation, and interpersonal communication skills in both remote and in-person settings.
• Experience coordinating and leading the full solution lifecycle in partnership with cross-functional teams.
